name: Facebook (very) Wide
description: Significantly increase the width of Facebook newsfeed and increase screen real estate by removing some of the unneeded elements
additional_info:
Key modification features:
- Top Facebook bar: reduce height
- Newsfeed: make much wider
- Left panel: move close to the edge
- Right panel: remove completely

Changes:
v1.0.1 - changed globalContainer width from 100% to 99% to annoying horizontal scrolling even when the whole page is already visible
v1.0.2 - changed table to fixed width to avoid Photos table on profile page overflowing left column
v1.1.0 - added style fixes for Pages
v1.2.0 - added style fixes for Timeline Review
